markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTasks/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis The Defiant has been launched from the beach at [Port Maje Island](/portMajeIsland/), but it still requires attention and proper repairs. However, to reach [Neketaka](/neketaka/) intact, you need provisions for the long sail ahead. ## Walkthrough * This is a simple tutorial quest that introduces ship supply management. To complete it, sail to [Port Maje](/portMaje/) and buy cannonballs, medical supplies, and repair supplies. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/09_Port_Maje/09_TSK_Supplies.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Basic Provisions''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | I'll need to stock my ship with supplies to critical to any extended voyages - ammunition, medicine, and repair materials. |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Purchase supplies for your ship.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Purchase repair supplies, cannon shot, and medical supplies for your ship. I can find a vendor selling these items in any port town. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I acquired some cannon shot for my ship. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | I acquired some repair supplies for my ship. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | I acquired some medical supplies for my ship. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I've stocked my ship with the supplies necessary for a voyage. |}

I can find a vendor selling these items in any port town. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I acquired some cannon shot for my ship. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | I acquired some repair supplies for my ship. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | I acquired some medical supplies for my ship. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I've stocked my ship with the supplies necessary for a voyage. |}
title: Basic Provisions
